ja542:7.1: Lohavijjālaṅkārābhā → lohavijjā alaṅkārā (sya1ed, sya2ed, csp1ed) | lohavijjālaṅkārā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja542:15.3: Pañcālo ca videho ca → pañcālā ca videhā ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja542:28.1: Taṃ bandhanena → taṃ pattharena (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | taṃ santhavena (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja542:36.3: kareyya → kareyyāsi (bj) | kareyu (sya1ed, sya2ed) | kareyyāsi me (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja542:37.3: sāḷikāyeva → sāḷikāya ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sālikāyeva (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja542:38.1: Yoyaṃ kāme → yaṃ yaṃ kāmī (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja542:39.1: jampāvatī → jambāvatī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | campāvatī (mr)
ja542:44.1: mā → nediso te (bj) | ediso te (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja542:47.5: okkantasattaṃ → okkantasantaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
ja542:52.4: vedehaṃ mithilaggahaṃ →  etthantare pāṭho si , pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu
ja542:62.3: Paduṭṭho brahmadattena → paduṭṭho te brahmadatto (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja542:71.1: Yadeva → yaṃ tveva (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), purisaṃ → puriso (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja542:111.3: Abhirūḷhañca taṃ ñatvā → abhiruyhañca ñatvāna (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja542:120.5: Amittahatthattagate → amittahatthatthagate (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | amittassa hatthagate (mr)
ja542:137.4: nāgakhandhe nipātino → nāgakhandhātipātino (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | nāgakkhandhanipātino (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja542:142.3: Duggaṇhosi → duggaṇho hi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja542:148.1: maṃsaṃva pātabyaṃ → maṃsaṃva pātabbaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | maṃsañca pātabyaṃ (sya1ed, mr)
ja542:176.1: Adhīyanti mahārāja → adhiyanti ve mahārāja (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja542:178.2: Umaṅgaṃ → ummaggaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | ummaṅgaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed), māpitaṃ → niṭṭhitaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja542:186.4: maññasi paṇḍita → maññanti paṇḍitā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja542:188.3: kapilaye tyamha → kampilliye tyamhā (bj) | kappiliye tyamhā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | kampilliyaraṭṭhe (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja542:192.5: Amittahatthattagate → amittahatthatthagate (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | amittassa hatthagate (mr)
ja542:199.1: Umaṅgajātakaṃ → mahāummaggajātakaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | mahosadhajātakaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
